name: Olaf Zimniak
story: Miron was born in Poland and grew up in a small village. He joined the military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks. Miron is a skilled marksman and has a lot of experience handling rifles. He is married with two children and spends most of his free time with his family. Despite being introverted, Miron is a capable leader and is respected by his comrades.
